description: A technology developed by the Weatheria scholars that allows for the creation and manipulation of various weather conditions. These special balls can generate wind, rain, lightning, and other meteorological phenomena.
abilities: Can be used for combat or practical purposes
Requires knowledge of meteorology to use effectively

keyMoments.title: Nami to Learn Weather Ball Technology
keyMoments.description: Haredas agrees to teach Nami everything about the Weather Ball technology.
keyMoments.significance: Nami will learn to use advanced weather manipulation tools during her training.

description: Advanced scientific blueprints and research documents left behind by Dr. Vegapunk in his hidden laboratory on Karakuri Island. These include designs for weapons, cyborg enhancements, and Devil Fruit research.

keyMoments.title: Franky Discovers the Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Franky finds Vegapunk's hidden laboratory containing intact blueprints.
keyMoments.significance: Provides Franky with knowledge to revolutionize his capabilities.

keyMoments.title: Franky Begins Studying the Blueprints
keyMoments.description: Franky commits to spending two years studying Vegapunk's research.
keyMoments.significance: Sets the foundation for Franky's post-timeskip upgrades.
